thread.title: London Transport Authority Plans to Introduce Sweeping Private Car Hire Restrictions
thread.title_full: London Transport Authority Plans to Introduce Sweeping Private Car Hire Restrictions - WSJ

author: Amir Mizroch
title: London Transport Authority Plans to Introduce Sweeping Private Car Hire Restrictions
text:
Transport for London, the U.K. capitalâ€™s authority for all matters relating to transport, plans to introduce new rules that could severely affect the business of Uber Technologies Inc., including an English-language requirement for drivers, stricter requirements for insurance, and a mandatory five-minute wait time between ordering a ride and pickup.
In addition, TfL said it would introduce a tough topographic exam to test driver... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
